Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute at California/56th
ShortDescription: 94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, 59th, Kedzie, 55th, and California due to, street blockage near California/56th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via California, 59th, Kedzie, 55th, and California due to, street blockage near California/56th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Kedzie
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Kedzie due to a door problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Kedzie due to a door problem. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
